game_description: In this experience you’ll see the world through another person’s eyes. But who are you? You’ll move across the office to get to your next meeting on time. As you go people’s reactions to you, will give you clues as to who you are. Experience four authentic stories of everyday people who face challenges we’re often unaware of. Come away with a better understanding of the daily challenges the people around us face and how the little things we do can make a big difference. Diversity brings strength, not just by creating a better work environment for employees but benefitting businesses as a whole. With D&I Perspectives you will: • Experience valuable and effecting personal stories • Reveal and explore microaggressions within the workplace • Build awareness is a truly memorable way
